page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: The most established industries in the area are to be found in Mill Lane where large boat yards are found.Frank Hall and Son have been boat builders and outfitters for 91 years and claim to be the oldest family business in the area.Bedwell and Co. yacht outfitters have been in business for 40 years but one of their buildings once housed the old horse drawn hearse of the local undertaker.Several small manufacturing industries are to be found at the top of Hall Lane but the iron foundry, famous for casting Big Ben,is now closed
